Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Board is a "Mini-Controller" for the board tasks

      • canMovePiece

        public java.lang.String canMovePiece(Player player,
                                     int[] move)
        This method checks to see if a player can move a piece from and to a certain spot
        Parameters:
        player - The player that has the piece
        move - An array that contains 4 elements, the initial and final row and column that the player has given as input
        Returns:
        "OK" if move is allowed, otherwise an error message is returned

      • movePiece

        public boolean movePiece(Player player,
                         int[] move)
        Move the piece if possible and if necessary capture the opponent's piece
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is making the move
        move - An array that contains 4 elements. Each element being initial row, initial column, final row, final column of the piece
        Returns:
        Whether the move was successful
